mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.didian_id as didianId ,a.guiji_time as guijiTime ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,didian.didian_name as didianName ,didian.didian_types as didianTypes ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.jiankang_types as jiankangTypes
FROM guiji a left JOIN didian didian ON a.didian_id = didian.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId}
and a.didian_id = #{params.didianId}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.guiji_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.guijiTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.guiji_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.guijiTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.didian_id IS NOT NULL
and didian.didian_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.didianName},'%')
and didian.didian_types = #{params.didianTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(didian.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(didian.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.jiankang_types = #{params.jiankangTypes}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
